turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Vietnamese diasporic music.
turn.1: What are the main characteristics of Vietnamese diasporic music?
turn.2: Led by enthusiastic individuals with the assistance of technological advances, members of the overseas Vietnamese population have successfully promoted their music to the world.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: Diasporic music as a special mixture of emotions has appealed not only the exiled Vietnamese but also residents in Vietnam.
turn.5: What are the most popular songs?
turn.6: Diasporic music got a large number of fans in the homeland in spite of the fact that overseas music has been restricted especially in the public by the unified Vietnam government since 1975.
turn.7: Is there anything else of importance?
turn.8: With the eventual loosening of restrictions on music production, most notably since 1996, Vietnam has been emerging to create its own popular music centre.
turn.9: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.10: Things connected to the pre-1975 period were seen as an essential piece of cultural memory.
turn.11: Is there anything else of note?
turn.12: Even some diasporic songs composed after 1975, inherited the pre-1975 standards.
